author: Soo Kim
title: Over 100,000 People Have Recovered From Coronavirus Around the World
description: Strict containment measures and rigorous testing from the onset of the outbreak appear to be the key contributing factors to help curb the spread.
content:
More than 100,000 people have recovered from the novel coronavirus, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
More cases of the COVID-19, which was first detected in China's Wuhan city of the Hubei province, have now been confirmed outsi… [+6374 chars]
